summary: 查询用户的操作日志记录。

schema.description:
日志类型，可选值：

- `OPERATION_TYPE_BIND`：价签绑定

- `OPERATION_TYPE_UNBIND`：价签解绑

- `OPERATION_TYPE_FORCE_UPDATE`：价签刷新 - 主动刷新

- `OPERATION_TYPE_ITEM_CHANGE_UPDATE`：价签刷新 - 商品更新

- `OPERATION_TYPE_ALL_UPDATE`：价签刷新 - 门店级刷新

- `OPERATION_TYPE_SEND_FAILED_RETRY`：操作重试 - 发送失败

- `OPERATION_TYPE_DISPLAY_FAILED_RETRY`：操作重试 - 显示失败

- `OPERATION_TYPE_LIGHT_UP_ESL_LED`：价签亮灯。
查询操作日志：开始时间。按照ISO8601标准表示，使用UTC+0时间。格式为：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ。
门店ID或商家自定义门店ID。
查询操作日志：结束时间。按照ISO8601标准表示，使用UTC+0时间。格式为：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ。
分页参数：每页显示条数，默认值10。

日志状态，可选值：

- `OPERATION_STATUS_NEW`：新建

- `OPERATION_STATUS_SENT`：已发送

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DISPLAY`：已显示

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DELETE`：已删除

- `OPERATION_STATUS_BREAK`：中断

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DEVICE_RETRY_DISPLAY`：重试中

- `OPERATION_STATUS_SEND_FAILED`：发送失败

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DISPLAY_FAILED`：显示失败。
分页参数：当前页码，默认值1。

ErrorMessage.example: The specified resource type is invalid.

DynamicMessage.example: The specified store %s does not exist.

PageSize.description: 分页参数：每页显示条数。

OperationType.description:
日志类型，可选值：

- `OPERATION_TYPE_BIND`：价签绑定

- `OPERATION_TYPE_UNBIND`：价签解绑

- `OPERATION_TYPE_FORCE_UPDATE`：价签刷新 - 主动刷新

- `OPERATION_TYPE_ITEM_CHANGE_UPDATE`：价签刷新 - 商品更新

- `OPERATION_TYPE_ALL_UPDATE`：价签刷新 - 门店级刷新

- `OPERATION_TYPE_SEND_FAILED_RETRY`：操作重试 - 发送失败

- `OPERATION_TYPE_DISPLAY_FAILED_RETRY`：操作重试 - 显示失败

- `OPERATION_TYPE_TIMEOUT_RETRY`：操作重试 - 操作超时

- `OPERATION_TYPE_ESL_NOT_FOUND_RETRY`：操作重试 - 未知设备

- `OPERATION_TYPE_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND_RETRY`：操作重试 - 未知模板

- `OPERATION_TYPE_DRAW_PICTURE_FAILED_RETRY`：操作重试- 异常模板

- `OPERATION_TYPE_BATCH_TIMES_DIRECTIONAL_REFRESH`：价签刷新 - 商品导入

- `OPERATION_TYPE_ON_LINE_RETRY`：价签刷新 - 上线重试

- `OPERATION_TYPE_LIGHT_UP_ESL_LED`：亮灯。

OperationStatus.description:
日志状态，返回值对应关系：

- `OPERATION_STATUS_NEW`：新建操作

- `OPERATION_STATUS_SENT`：发送操作

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DISPLAY`：完成操作

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DELETE`：删除操作

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DEVICE_RETRY_DISPLAY`：重试操作

- `OPERATION_STATUS_SEND_FAILED`：发送失败

- `OPERATION_STATUS_DISPLAY_FAILED`：刷新失败。

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "E69C8998-1787-4999-8C75-D663FF1173CF", "ErrorMessage": "The specified resource type is invalid.", "Success": true, "ErrorCode": "MandatoryParameters", "Code": "-1001", "Message": "success", "DynamicMessage": "The specified store %s does not exist.", "PageSize": 10, "PageNumber": 1, "TotalCount": 100, "DynamicCode": "PlatformResponseError.%s", "UserLogs": [ { "EslBarCode": "18bc5a63****", "OperationSendTime": "2020-03-17T02:25:17Z", "ActionPrice": "500", "UserId": "134****", "PriceUnit": "台", "ResultCode": "2002", "ItemId": "123456", "GmtModified": "2020-03-17T02:26:17Z", "OperationType": "OPERATION_TYPE_BIND", "OperationResponseTime": "2020-03-17T02:26:17Z", "OperationStatus": "OPERATION_STATUS_NEW", "StoreId": "s-dxsxxx****", "ItemShortTitle": "牛奶", "LogId": "123456", "BePromotion": false, "GmtCreate": "2020-03-17T02:26:17Z", "EslSignal": 50, "SpendTime": "10", "ItemBarCode": "690560583****", "I18nResultKey": "" } ] }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"200 68 10 78DDE5D5-7E14-4BED-92AF-C465C74BCDBF 1 true 2020-03-16T06:38:56Z 999 2020-03-16T06:38:57Z 123456 0 123456 2020-03-16T06:38:56Z 18bc5a63**** 个 促销商品 s-ph5agd**** OPERATION_STATUS_SEND_FAILED OPERATION_TYPE_BIND 123456 Error00000011|Assemble sending package fail! true 2020-03-16T06:36:46Z 1688 2020-03-16T06:36:47Z 123456 0 123456 2020-03-16T06:36:46Z 18bc5a63**** 盒 常规商品 s-ph5agd**** OPERATION_STATUS_SEND_FAILED OPERATION_TYPE_BIND 123456 Error00000011|Assemble sending package fail! false 78DDE5D5-7E14-4BED-92AF-C465C74BCDBF true","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询操作日志
